item.title: Digimon Story: Time Stranger ‘Deep Dive with Producer Ryosuke Hara’ video
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

A nine-minute introduction.

Publisher Bandai Namco and developer Media.Vision have released a nine-minute gameplay deep dive for Digimon Story: Time Stranger with producer Ryosuke Hara.

Here is an overview of the game, via Bandai Namco:

About

Digimon Story: Time Stranger is an RPG with monster-taming elements that explores the deep bond between humans and Digimon in an epic story that unravels the mystery of the world’s collapse.

Embark on an adventure that spans across the human world and Digital World, collecting and raising a diverse array of Digimon to fight in turn-based battles.

Key Features

  • An Epic Story of Connection – Tokyo, Japan. An agent of a secret organization encounters an unknown creature shortly before a city-leveling explosion. They then reawaken eight years in the past… Take on a mission to uncover the mystery of the world’s collapse, where chance encounters with unique characters will shape your journey across time and parallel worlds—and change fate itself.
  • Adventure Between Worlds and Time – Journey between the parallel human world and the Digital World: Iliad where Digimon reside. See the Digital World and its intricately detailed realms like never before, with interactive elements and special quests to explore.
  • Strategic Turn-Based Battles – Enjoy dynamic turn-based combat that combines strategic elements with evolved battle components. More than 450 Digimon and deep customization options provide limitless ways to approach the challenges of battle and reveal the strength of the bonds formed with your Digimon.

Digimon Story: Time Stranger is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam on October 3.

item.title: Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree ‘Guardians’ trailer – Nishiki and Rekka
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Protect the village with the help of Guardian companions.

Publisher Bandai Namco and developer Brownies have released a new trailer for roguelite action game Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree introducing the Guardians Nishiki and Rekka.

Here is an overview of the game, via Bandai Namco:

About

A new roguelike where bonds, blades, and bravery decide the fate of all.

In a far-off mystic realm, ancient forces stir, and untold dangers await.

In this roguelite adventure set in a far-off mystic realm, ancient forces stir, and untold dangers await. As Towa, lead the guardians of the sacred tree in forging strong relationships and powerful swords to fight Magatsu’s forces and determine the future of Shinju Village.

Key Features

  • Enter a Vibrant World Filled With Beauty and Perilous Danger – On their quest to restore peace, play as Towa and the Guardians as they explore far-off lands threatened by Magatsu’s evil influence. In a world where even splendor hides a lurking threat, courage is the only way forward. As Hitoshi Sakimoto’s melodies guide the way, a breathtaking yet untamed landscape unfolds where the fight to save Shinju Village begins.
  • Fight as a Duo in a Thrilling Roguelite Combat – Towa, priestess of Shinju, stands united with eight trustworthy companions to defeat Magatsu. Fight alongside a fellow guardian and wield the power of the sacred sword (Tsurugi) and staff (Kagura). Each guardian has its own abilities and set of swords, making each combat style and guardian pair unique. Together, pave your way through colorful lands, conquer dungeons, and defeat Magatsu’s minions!
  • Forge Weapons and Bonds That Stand the Test of Time – As the guardians pursue their quests across different timelines, the village evolves over the years. Develop unique bonds with its residents and learn more about their customs and stories that are woven into the inner workings of the village. Each visit is a chance to train at the dojo, summon powerful Graces, and craft new swords at the smithing shop.

Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam on September 19.

item.title: My Hero Academia: All’s Justice announced for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

A fighting action game centered around the final battle.

Publisher Bandai Namco and developer Byking have announced fighting action game My Hero Academia: All’s Justice for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC (Steam). A release date was not announced.

“I’m truly happy to finally be able to reveal this game to you all today!,” producer Aoba Miyazaki said in a video message. “This title is the latest console game based on My Hero Academia, a fighting action game centered around the final battle, the climax of the original story. In this title, we’ve strived to deliver a fresh experience to both longtime fans of the My Hero Academia games and avid anime viewers alike, focusing on recreating the final battle with gameplay elements that let players immerse themselves further into the conflict and climax of the story.

“Currently, we’re developing the game alongside the production of the anime’s final season. Players will be able to experience a game-exclusive take on the final battle different from the anime. Please experience the intense final battle with beautiful graphics we hope will do justice to the amazing art of the source material.

“We are happy to announce that this title will feature a huge roster of characters from the anime. Fan-favorite characters who played a key role in the final battle are joining the fight, and you’ll even be able to use their new techniques and forms from the final battle. Pus, for the first time in a My Hero Academia console game, all students of Class 1-A will be implemented! Engage in battles where each character’s unique Quirk is brought to life with faithful detail.

“We’ve crafted the battle system to be intuitive and accessible so that both anime enthusiasts, game aficionados, or anyone can experience the thrill of Quirk battles, where strategy meets action. Engage in intense battles, where you’ll form teams of up to three characters, and seamlessly chain together attacks by switching between them. With the new ‘Rising’ system, you can significantly boost the power of your character by unleashing their full potential.

“More information about the battle system will be revealed soon, so please stay posted. Today, we’ve shared a small glimpse of all the amazing things we have planned for the new game, My Hero Academia: All’s Justice. We’ve packed it with features to ensure both longtime fans of the My Hero Academia games and avid anime viewers alike will be even more satisfied, so please look forward to it!”

  • ❮
  • ❯

Here is an overview of the game, via Bandai Namco:

About

Smash through My Hero Academia‘s final story arc and triumph over your foes in spectacular three-versus-three battles! Follow Deku and the journeys of other characters in the Final War between Heroes and Villains, and experience the world-shaking, climactic clash between One For All and All For One in My Hero Academia: All’s Justice!

My Hero Academia: All’s Justice is the super-powered 3D arena fighter where your favorite characters from the My Hero Academia franchise appear in their latest and most powerful forms, framed within a Refined Battle System that showcases their Quirks to their limits!

The Final War

Experience the final season of My Hero Academia from a new perspective in My Hero Academia: All’s Justice‘s story mode. Take control of the clashes between Hero and Villains and immerse yourself in the story’s ultimate clash in a cinematic experience only achievable through My Hero Academia: All’s Justice.

Giant-Sized Roster

Heroes and Villains collide in the gigantic roster of My Hero Academia characters! Play your favorite U.A. Students, Pro Heroes, and Villains from across the full story of My Hero Academia, including their final and full-powered versions!

Unleash Your Quirks

Take control of your favorite U.A. Students, Pro Heroes, and Villains, and utilize their unique Quirks to pummel, blast, and trick your foes.

Unleash the full suite of new battle features to emerge victorious on the battlefield. Express all the power of your character in new and never-before-seen ways!
